9793.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9793.quoteText: In addition, all data uploaded to Spark by the appraiser or their assistants/trainees is permanently deleted within two hours of being uploaded.
9793.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

9794.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9794.quoteText: The Spark application does not utilize tracking cookies and does not sell or market any of your information or data to ANY other service or party.
9794.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

9795.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9795.quoteText:
In addition, during the Account Creation process you can opt out of any promotional or "tutorial" emails and only receive emails critical to the application itself.
In addition, you can unsubscribe to any list at any time.
9795.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

9796.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9796.quoteText: If you wish to cancel your account and remove all personal/private information from our records you may do so at any time.
9796.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

9797.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9797.quoteText:
Spark is a subscription service with no contracts.
You can cancel your subscription at any time.
9797.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

9798.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9798.quoteText: In addition, based on past performance and guarantees from our data providers, we guarantee an accessibility time of 99% or more
9798.title: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

tosdr.case: Accessibility to this service is guaranteed at 99% or more

9800.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9800.quoteText:
When using any form-filler other than a la mode, you can cancel the subscription yourself from within your account and you'll automatically be prompted for a full refund if it's within the 48 hour time-frame.
If you use a la mode then you'll need to contact them to cancel and/or for the refund.
9800.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

tosdr.case: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

9801.quoteDoc: Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
9801.quoteText: Any material or critical changes or changes that adversely affect you, the user, will be provided by email.
9801.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
